text: @realDonaldTrump Or how @realDonaldTrump plans to blame Governors, County Commissioner & Mayors who made public health safety their first priority for the #POTUS driven economic downturn due to his being unprepared for #COVID19. entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
